original_title: Gần Mà Xa – Khu Rừng Của Tổ Tiên
overview: The construction of a dam has forced the resettlement of a village located in Vietnam’s central highlands and inhabited by the Katu ethnic minority. Today the land of their ancestors has been submerged by the waters of an artificial lake. Characters from three generations embody the fate of this community.
title: Gần Mà Xa – Khu Rừng Của Tổ Tiên
